title: :pencil:   Editing a picture's attributes
description:
You can edit the title, description, date and location of a picture.

To do so, you will first need to find the original message of the picture in <#${picChannelId}>. If you use the `/cute-pic` command, you can click the **options button (:gear:)** to open the picture's original message.
​

fields.name: Editing attributes
fields.value:
Simply click the **edit button (:pencil:)** on the original message and edit the attributes you want to change.

Leave the attributes you don't want to change blank.
​

fields.name: Resetting attributes
fields.value: If you want to reset an attribute, type a space in the field.
